column1: #text=A few years ago , I did some volunteer work in my local community .
#text=I like giving back to my community .
#text=One of the things we did was plant trees in the city .
#text=This was my first experience with planting trees .
#text=First I had to prepare the ground .
#text=The soil was already in great shape for the tree so that part was taken care of .
#text=I grabbed a shovel and then started digging .
#text=Then it was time to plan the tree .
#text=The tree was small , so I was able to remove it from the pot by putting it upside down .
#text=I then gently placed the tree in the hole and then filled the hole back up with the dirt .
#text=The next thing I did was add mulch around the area of the tree .
#text=Once the mulch was added , I put a stake in the ground and tied it to the tree .
#text=This was to hold the tree in place as it grows for the first year .
